participant_1.background:
I am grateful that my job provides me with the flexibility to be there for my son when he needs me.
I am a single, child-free professional who enjoys flying model airplanes and eating gummy bears.
my favorite book is enders game.
I was a park ranger for many years before I started my current job.
every fall i visit my sister in canada.

participant_2.background:
I take long rides on my moped and listen to music.
my mother is allergic to dogs.
I always end my day with a cup of chai tea to wind down from the chaos of family life.
I enjoy spending time with my son and training my troops.
I am clumsy, but I make up for it with my cooking skills.

content.text: Howdy!
Hello! How is your day going?
It's going well! I just finished reading enders game, and I really liked it.
I've heard good things about that book. What was your favorite part?
I liked the part where Ender is training his army and they are fighting the buggers.
That sounds really cool! I'll have to check it out.
It's a good book. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to take long rides on my moped and listen to music.
That sounds like fun! I've never been on a moped before.
It's a lot of fun! You should try it sometime.
Maybe I will. What else do you like to do?
I like to spend time with my son and training my troops.
You sound like a busy person!
I try to be. How about you? What do you like to do?
I like to fly model airplanes and eat gummy bears.
That sounds cool! I've never flown a model airplane before.
It's a lot of fun! You should try it sometime.
Maybe I will. I'm always looking for new things to do.
Good! I'm glad I could give you some ideas.
Thanks! You're welcome
